name: The Greatest Story Ever Told (The_Runner_01)
description:
The Greatest Story Ever Told!

This is a game made for the 2022 Game Devcember jam. Pretty happy that  I managed to end up with a prototype. I also had the chance to create all the 2D graphics on paper which was great! I actually had that idea for quite a while but I never tried it. It was an exciting experience. I wish  I could do more but it wasn't possible with my limited skills and the busy program of December.

I did learn a lot of things about Unity which is great!

Anyway, here is a game where 2D, 3D,  analog, and digital come together. The theme of "Deja -Vu" is implemented by the main character's ability to control time. The idea is to be able to stop and reverse time.

Graphics, Sound Effects, Music, Programming, and Game Design are all made by me!

How to play

- WASD to move

- Move over an item to collect it

- When available press f to Freeze Time

Tools

- Blender for 3D modeling and rigging

- Texture Lab for texture creation.

- Reaper for audio effects creation.

- Audacity for audio editing.

- Waveform for music production

- Procreate to edit 2D graphics
